-Mh4idpPGalRY5uytn8e.author: Sir Winston S. Churchill
-Mh4idpPGalRY5uytn8e.text: The price of greatness is responsibility.

-Mh4ivJ5IVk3GjqBRcOv.author: Sir Arthur Conan Doyle
-Mh4ivJ5IVk3GjqBRcOv.text: When you have eliminated all which is impossible, then whatever remains, however improbable, must be the truth...

-Mh4j-ZmkLUcacGTfhW8.author: Agatha Christie
-Mh4j-ZmkLUcacGTfhW8.text: Very few of us are what we seem.
